Text:
The Great Ize Shrine... So this is where the "Heart's
Bounty" might be.

...Why did you drag me along? And why am I dressed
up in a kimono?

Well, I needed a guide, didn't I? And isn't it nice
wearing a beautiful outfit for a visit to a shrine?

By the way, I put a lot of thought into the design
of my kimono as well! The white camellia symbolizes
"perfect beauty," "impeccable charm"...

Don't you think it's perfect for me as I'm about to
acquire the perfect charm?
What do rice cakes have to do with "charm"?
Th-That's a secret! Come on, let's start looking!
Alright, alright... What the heck is up with you...?

And so, the two search the shrine for clues about
the legendary rice cake, but...
It's not here... It's nowhere to be found!

The rice cake at the stalls were also just regular
ones. It's a legend, so maybe it's not that easy to
find.

First of all, are you sure this is even the location
of the legendary rice cake? There are shady-looking
attractions and mascots, but nothing about this
shrine feels traditional...

We're talking about something legendary, right?
I imagined somewhere more...dignified.

I was surprised too when I first came here. Never
thought there'd really be a shrine like Lady Alpha
and that dumb dog described.

When I heard their story, I thought that meathead
had finally lost it.

...Hm?! I thought I heard someone bad-mouthing
me...!
Huh? That voice—

*sigh* Alright then. I told you both about last
year's Great Ize-athlon, right?
Yes, I heard it was a crazy event...

Right, and this year, they've spiced it up even more
for a lively and fun experience.

They've also changed the grand prize from the kagami
rice cake to "Heart's Bounty" rice cake—
"Heart's Bounty"?!

I'll participate! Whether it's "2.0" or whatever,
I'll win it!

Uh, okay...good luck. By the way, there are other
great prizes as well. Here's a flyer.
Let's see...hmm, interesting...

It's not your thing, kitty cat. Besides, you're too
scared to participate—
No, I'm participating too.
What?! Why?! You were reluctant to even come here...

That was then, this is now. I feel like joining the
festivities. That's fine, right?

(Did Zeta also develop a desire for the "Heart's
Bounty" while we were searching for it?)

(But I won't lose! No matter who my opponent is,
I won't hand it over!)

So, what will the dumb doggie do? Running away is
also a tactic, you know?

No way am I running away! Fine, I'll participate
too!

No, you can't. If you both participate, who knows
what will happen to the venue.
Then that's a default win for me, isn't it?
No way!

...Oh? If it isn't Alpha and Delta! Glad to see you
participating again this year!

You're the priest from last year... Unfortunately,
this year, we're just spectators.

I see, I see! In that case, Alpha, could you and the
others please provide live commentary and analysis?
What do you think?

I'm sure it will be quite exciting if the top
performers from the previous event could
take on this role!

I don't mind. Hehe. If I'm going to commentate,
I'll have to remain impartial.

Live commentary? Analysis? Can I make the kitty cat
admit defeat?

Priest, as you can see, you'd best give up on the
idea. Getting this dumb doggie to do commentary
is impossible.
What?! Leave the commentary and analysis to me!

Oh, thank you! In that case, will the commentators
please come with me? Those who wish to participate,
please hurry to the registration!
Well, we're off then. You two, do your best.
Of course!
Well, I might as well put in some effort.

(Zeta, putting in effort? She really is aiming to
win. But...)
...Zeta. I won't lose to you.
Huh? I don't plan to compete against you, Epsilon.

Does that mean you don't even see me as
competition?! I'm the one who's going to
win and get the "Heart's Bounty"!
It's not like that...but okay.
It's better for me if you're motivated. Hehe...
